name: Wesley BRENNAN, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee

parties: Wesley BRENNAN, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of December, 2015, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Theron Richard Perez, Vincent R. Mazeski, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Mechaniesburg, for Department of Corrections.
casebody.head_matter:
129 A.3d 513
Wesley BRENNAN, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 21, 2015.
Wesley Brennan, Pro Se.
Theron Richard Perez, Vincent R. Mazeski, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Mechaniesburg, for Department of Corrections.
